title: Azure Bicep Deployment
description: Configuration for deploying an Azure Bicep template using Azure CLI.

templateFile.title: Bicep Template File
templateFile.description: Deprecated and will be permanently removed! Specify the Bicep file path in the 'Working Directory' configuration of the template or Git Repository instead.

deploymentScope.title: Deployment Scope
deploymentScope.description:
The scope at which to deploy the Bicep template:
- 'Subscription': Deploy at subscription level (subscription ID retrieved from selected Cloud Connector)
- 'Resource Group': Deploy at resource group level (resource group name must be provided via ARM_RESOURCE_GROUP environment variable in workflow settings).

deploymentMode.title: Deployment Mode
deploymentMode.description:
Specifies how resources should be deployed (required only when Deployment Scope is Resource Group):
- 'Incremental': Only new or modified resources will be deployed.
- 'Complete': Existing resources not in the template will be deleted.
- 'What-if': Simulates the deployment without making changes.

location.title: Azure Region
location.description: The Azure region where the deployment will be executed. This is required when deploymentScope is Subscription. Example values: 'eastus', 'westus2', 'centralus', 'northeurope', 'westeurope', 'germanywestcentral', 'germanynorth'.

deploymentName.title: Deployment Name
deploymentName.description: An optional name for the deployment. If not provided, Azure will generate a default name.

additionalParameters.title: Additional Parameters
additionalParameters.description: Additional parameters to append to the az deployment command. For example: '--debug'.
